./external/basejump_stl/bsg_misc/bsg_concentrate_static.v Cov: 23.5% 

   1: `include "bsg_defines.v"
   2: 
   3: // given a bunch of signals, and a bitvector parameter, gather/concentrate
   4: // those bits together into a more condensed vector
   5: //
   6: // example: pattern_els_p = 5'b11101
   7: //
   8: 
   9: module bsg_concentrate_static #(parameter pattern_els_p="inv", width_lp=$bits(pattern_els_p), set_els_lp=`BSG_COUNTONES_SYNTH(pattern_els_p))
  10: (input [width_lp-1:0] i
  11:  ,output [set_els_lp-1:0] o
  12: );
  13:    genvar j;
  14: 
  15:    if (pattern_els_p[0])
  16:      assign o[0]=i[0];
  17: 
  18:    for (j = 1; j < width_lp; j=j+1)
  19:      begin : rof
  20:        if (pattern_els_p[j])
  21:          assign o[`BSG_COUNTONES_SYNTH(pattern_els_p[j-1:0])] = i[j];
  22:      end
  23: 
  24: endmodule
  25: 
  26:
